backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that includes a blob storage mixin and exposes a `getQuotes` query returning a hardcoded list of four humorous philosophical quotes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report file with an empty features array, indicating no features have been recorded yet.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including sidebar, chart, and UI element tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the app titled 'Cash's Famous Philosophy' that mounts the React app into a root div via the main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders `QuotesPage` inside an `ErrorBoundary` and always displays a `Footer` with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: Class-based React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a themed fallback UI with an optional dev-mode error message and a 'Try again' reset button.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCard.tsx: Presentational component that renders a single quote as a styled card with decorative quotation marks, wobble transforms, accent symbols, and a numbered badge.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCardSkeleto: Loading skeleton placeholder component for quote cards using themed skeleton blocks to maintain layout during data fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor instance changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication hook and provider that manages AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout state, and exposes identity context to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook `useGetQuotes` that fetches quotes from the backend actor once it is available, with 3 retries and exponential backoff up to 30 seconds.
frontend/src/index.css: Main CSS file importing Zilla Slab and Caveat fonts, defining a warm earthy OKLCH color palette, card wobble transforms, text shadow utilities, and quote cycling transition classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the `App` component with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider` before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/QuotesPage.tsx: React page that fetches and displays quotes in a cycling carousel with fade transitions, dot indicators, and skeleton/error/empty states.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Zilla Slab, Caveat), an oklch-based color palette (amber, cream, espresso), and extended border radius/container settings.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document recording known backend connectivity issues and pending action items including fixing the IC agent host URL and adding new hardcoded quotes to the backend canister.
